tech-log / jekyll-on-github

How it is built

Posted on Jan 04, 2017 By Shayang Zang

  • Quick start
  • About jekyll
  • About ruby eco behind jekyll

Quick start

create github account as well as a repository for your site.

clone source code and push to your own repository.

Go to your repository settings and allow Github Page to source from the master branch.

About jekyll

Jekyll is written in ruby supported by Github Page.

If you have ruby installed, the following will get you jekyll.

This will host your site built based on jekyll template on local machine.

If you want to specify other host.

About ruby eco behind jekyll

  1. nice way to install ruby

  2. gem is a ruby library manager. It helps to install ruby packages such as jekyll and bundler.

  3. bundler is a ruby project dependencies manager. It initialize a ruby project wit a Gemfile, where you list all the dependencies you want to use as well as their versions. So anyone with the same Gemfile can create the same dev environment via one command:

  • Please reference the author of this jekyll template for more specific instructions.
